KYC_MISSING: Request customer to upload valid government ID and proof of address to complete KYC.
RISK_HOLD: Review account's transaction patterns. Escalate to Risk team if necessary to whitelist safe transactions.
BANK_ERROR: Advise customer to verify their linked bank account details and resolve any bank-side issues.
INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS: Notify customer about insufficient balance and recommend retrying after adding funds.
APPROVED: No action needed. Transaction was successful.
